title: Ultrathin single-ion sieving membrane with sub-1-nm channels for suppressing Li dendrite and polysulfide shuttling
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02038C, Paper
Rongrong Li, Yi-Chi Wang, Jingmin Zhang, Jun Yang, Jiang He, Wenjie Mai, Xiong Pu
Regulating selectively ion migrations at the subnanometre scale is a paramount approach to intercept polysulfide shuttling and suppress Li dendrite for lithium-sulfur batteries; but state-of-the-art approaches lack the capacity to...
